**Breezehost.net Presents "JANUARY-DELIGHT" Offer : NO INSTALLATION CHARGES for Managed/Unmanaged VPS Plans | 30% OFF on Managed + Unmetered Bandwidth | 15% OFF + 1 GB RAM + Unmetered Bandwidth for 6 months**

We at Breezehost.net are pleased to present our newest promotion, a very special offer with Managed and Unmanaged VPS servers located in US Dallas and Netherlands Limited stock so be sure to act fast as this will not last long. 30% Discount on our Managed plans ClixPro-4, ClixPro-5, ClixPro-6 and 15% on our Unmanaged plans ClixPro-1, ClixPro-2, and ClixPro-3
You may choose your desired location in the order form. Instant setup. We guarantee 15 minutes of response times via ticket. Also have 24x7 Live Chat support, so you will no longer have to wait for support. Our support team is lightning speed to help you at all times if you have a managed service. You will get reliable support and service throughout your hosting experience. 99.99% Up time Guarantee. 

Limited offer sign up TODAY….
******************************************************************************
**BreezeHost’s VPS Plans include...**
• Equal CPU Share
• SolusVM Control Panel
• OpenVZ Technology
• FULL Root Access
• TUN/TAP Enabled by default
• Multiple Linux OS Choices to install/reinstall
• Free Website Transfer
• Free Instant Setup
• 24x7 Live Support
• 100 mbps Port Speed

NOTE : 1 GB RAM offers is especially for our ClixDev-3 package

Please use the Promotion Code: **Madsale** to get 30% discount on our Managed VPS’s and
Use  **Sidak15%** for getting 15% discount on our Unmanaged VPSs
******************************************************************************
**Unmanaged Plans:**

**1.  ClixDev-1   $5.95 with 15% you pay  $5.05**
Specifications ;
*	10GB Space 
*	Unmetered Bandwidth
*	256 MB Guaranteed RAM
*	512 MB Burst RAM
*	SolusVM
*	Free AlphaSSL
******************************************************************************
**2.	ClixDev-2  $6.95 with 15% you pay $5.90**
Specification;

*	Unmetered Bandwidth
*	384 MB Guaranteed RAM 
*	600 MB Burst RAM
*	SolusVM
*	Free AlphaSSL

******************************************************************************
**15% Discount for the first 15 Signups on ClixDev-3**
******************************************************************************

******************************************************************************
**To get 30% discount on Managed Plans, use coupon code ‘MADSALE’ and for more info, please visit our website http://www.breezehost.net/**
******************************************************************************

**Operating Systems:**

• CentOS 5 32bit
• CentOS 5 64Bit
• Debian 5 32Bit
• Debian 5 64bit
• Ubuntu 9.04 32Bit
• Ubuntu 9.04 64Bit
• Fedora-13 32Bit
• Fedora-13 64Bit
• Suse-11.1 32Bit
• Suse-11.1 64Bit  
******************************************************************************
At Breezehost, we have put in place, unique systems and structures that allow us to give our lovable clients...high quality VPS hosting without the high price.

When you sign up for our VPS hosting, we are very proud to offer you the following exciting services:
• Stable And Reliable Servers Using Newest Technology
• VPS Control Panel In the event you need to reinstall, restart, or console your VPS you may do so at your convenience in the VPS Control Panel.
• 99.99% Uptime Guarantee ( Our servers are always on, everyday, all day, guaranteed.
• Instant Setup after payment confirmation
• No Contracts In the very rare instance that you would want to host elsewhere you can cancel your account at any time.
• RAID Protected Storage Our servers RAID hard drive technology. This technology enables your sites to be stored on two hard drives at the same time. Should one fail, the other hard drive will continue to serve your sites/applications, and there will zero down time just like nothing even happened.
